message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make sure I get a good price for the product. I can offer you a compromise at $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within $90. Could we possibly reach a mutual agreement at that price?
